original_text: The Lord spoke again to Haggai, his prophet, on the 24th day of the ninth month, in the second year since Darius had become king. This was the Lord's message:
korean_text: 다리오 왕 제이년 아홉째 달 이십사일에 여호와의 말씀이 선지자 학개에게 임하니라 이르시되

sentences.original_text: The Lord spoke again to Haggai
on the 24th day of the ninth month
in the second year since Darius had become king
sentences.korean_translation: 다리우스가 왕이 된 지 이년째 되던 해에
